titleStmt.title: Miklós Oláh to King Ferdinand I (Vienna, 1 February 1549)

seriesStmt.title: Bibliotheca Scriptorum Medii Recentisque Aevorum: Series nova

note.p: Notes: Original letter with signature and seal.

div.head: Miklós Oláh to King Ferdinand I (Vienna, 1 February 1549)

body.p: 1. He received two letters from him yesterday: one on his letter to Emperor Charles V on celebrating the ecumenical council and the free confirmation of the prelates, and another that Oláh should send Queen Isabella’s and George Martinuzzi’s letters back. He has written to Pál Várday about the Pope’s confirmation of the prelates, whose letter he attaches. One thing seems necessary, i.e. the King should charge the Bishops of Nitra and Veszprém as well as Balázs Péterváradi in a special letter with starting the process of ordination. Oláh himself will receive the higher orders from the Bishop of Senj in two days. 2. He should let him know what his plan is regarding Zsigmond János so they can let the commissioners know when they go to Martinuzzi on Saint Matthew’s day. He is expecting Tamás Nádasdy in two days, who has been complaining to him about the lack of funds. It would be good if by the time he got here, the King instructed the Chamber, if nothing else works, to take care of his expenses.

div.p: Sacratissime Rex Domine, Domine mihi Clementissime, fidelitatis et servitiorum meorum perpetuorum in gratiam Sacratissimae Maiestatis Vestrae humillimam commendationem!

[1.] Die hesterna binas Sacratissimae Maiestatis Vestrae accepi litteras. AlterasSee Ep. 707./o:olahus.tei.15490127_2 de sacratissimae caesareae maiestatis in promovenda apud summum dominum nostrum celebratione concilii generalis et item confirmatione gratuita praelatorum Hungariae, singulari in rem publicam Christianam clementia atque pio affectu. AlterasSee Ep. 706./o:olahus.tei.15490127_1 vero, quibus Sacratissima Maiestas Vestra iubet sibi quamprimum mitti acta legationis serenissimae reginae Isabellae etc. et responsi Sacratissimae Maiestatis Vestrae illi ac Fratri GeorgioGeorge Martinuzzi. aliisque nobilibus dati. Secundum Sacratissimae Maiestatis Vestrae mandatum mitto nunc ad eam copiam praemissae et legationis et responsi. De confirmatione autem apud summum pontificem praelatorum Hungariae sollicitanda scripsi ad dominum Strigoniensem,Pál Várday. cui litteras etiam Sacratissimae Maiestatis Vestrae misi.We do not know these letters. Unum tamen videtur esse necessarium, quod Maiestas Vestra Sacratissima dignetur litteris suis mandare specialibus Nittriensi,Ferenc Thurzó (†1576) was Bishop of Nitra between 1534 and 1557. He was the President of the Hungarian Chamber and the Court Chamber (1549–1563). For more see Gecsényi 2010. VesprimiensiMárton Kecseti. et Blasio,Balázs Péterváradi. ut sacris initientur. Ego postquam vocatione divina, Sacratissima Maiestas Vestra me hoc statu, in quo sum, clementer me providere dignata est, per dominum Segniensem,Ferenc Jozefics. quem hac de causa huc nunc accersivi, maiores sacros ordines, hoc biduo ex Dei gratia ad summam Sacratissimam Maiestatem Vestram Deus idem optimus maximus ad multa saecula felicem ac incolumem conservare dignetur. In cuius clementiam me et fidelia servitia mea iterum atque iterum unice commendo.

seg.add: Eiusdem Sacratissimae Maiestatis Vestrae fidelis et humilis servitor, Agriensis

div.p: [2.] Si Sacratissima Maiestas Vestra in negotio provisionis filiiJohn Sigismund Szapolyai. serenissimae reginae Isabellae a maiestate caesarea aliquid responsi habet, dignetur ea in re ad commissarios suos, qui ad festum beati Mathiae Apostoli24 February. fratrem Georgium conventuri sunt, dare commissionem, ut Sacratissimae Maiestati Vestrae videbitur, simul vel divisim. Dum NadasdiTamás Nádasdy. unum ex commissariis hoc triduo huc exspecto. Is tamen de expensarum inopia per litteras suas non parum apud me conqueritur. Cum quo de his loquar, dum advenerit, bonum esset Sacratissimam Maiestatem Vestram consiliariis camerae mandare, ut si aliter fieri non posset, providerent ei de expensis honestis et convenientibus. Nam Nadasdi pro dignitate Sacratissimae Maiestatis Vestrae ac conditione status sui atque officii scribae expensas illas menstruas pro intertentione mensae ei designatas in legatione hac, in qua authoritatis Maiestatis Vestrae Sacratissimae habenda erit ratio, parum sibi suffecturas.

div.head: On the outer side:
div.p: Sacratissimae maiestati regiae Romanorum Hungariae et Boemiae etc. domino, domino meo clementissimo.
